p: The antioxidant activity of FA could be attributed to its flavonoids. HPLC-DAD identified gallic acid, hydroquinone, apigenin, naringenin, ascorbic acid, cysteine, rutin, quercetin, and kaempferol. Mechraoui et al. [ 18] reported an IC 50 = 0.1602 mg/mL from Tunisian NS. IC 50 was 2.69 mg/mL from a Pakistani NS. These results are different from ours with an IC 50 equal to 0.79 mg/mL.
